official_title: Improving the Quality of Smoking Cessation and Shared Decision Making for Lung Cancer Screening: A Cluster Randomized Trial
inclusion_criteria:
* PATIENTS: Primary care patients
* PATIENTS: Upcoming primary care office visit
* PATIENTS: Current smoker
* PATIENTS: 30 plus (+) pack-year smoking history
* PATIENTS: English-speaking
* PROVIDERS: Primary health care providers
* PROVIDERS: Provide care to adults
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 55 Years
Must have maximum age of 77 Years
exclusion_criteria: * PATIENTS: History of lung cancer by self-report
